identified-content.person: RUDNICKI, DR. ANNA MARIA (DR. ANNA MARIA BARBIERI)

block.p: Dr. Anna Maria Rudnicki, the daughter of Dr. Joanna Rudnicki and Dr. Marek Rudnicki of Chicago, was married yesterday to Dr. Anthony Vincent Barbieri III, the son of Rosina Barbieri and Mr. Barbieri Jr. of Alpine, N.J. The Rev. Louis J. Mazza, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at the Church of the Immaculate Conception in Sleepy Hollow, N.Y.

The bride, who graduated from Colgate University, and the bridegroom, a graduate of the University of Pennsylvania, received medical degrees from the State University Health Science Center at Syracuse.

Dr. Anna Maria Rudnicki, the daughter of Dr. Joanna Rudnicki and Dr. Marek Rudnicki of Chicago, was married yesterday to Dr. Anthony Vincent Barbieri III, the son of Rosina Barbieri and Mr. Barbieri Jr. of Alpine, N.J. The Rev. Louis J. Mazza, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at the Church of the Immaculate Conception in Sleepy Hollow, N.Y.

The bride, who graduated from Colgate University, and the bridegroom, a graduate of the University of Pennsylvania, received medical degrees from the State University Health Science Center at Syracuse.

The bride, 27, is a resident in obstetrics and gynecology at the Mount Sinai Medical Center in New York. Her father is a general surgeon at the University of Illinois at Chicago Medical Center. Her mother is a former neurologist.

The bridegroom, 30, is completing his preliminary year in internal medicine at New York Methodist Hospital. His mother is a substitute teacher in the Alpine Public School. His father owns A&B Leather and Findings, a leather distribution company in New York.
